snippet: A slide show of photographs of the past week in New York City and the region includes the unveiling of the mayor’s housing plan, the exoneration of three men convicted of murder, and the aviary at the Queens Zoo.
abstract: A slide show of photographs of the past week in New York City and the region includes the unveiling of the mayor’s housing plan, the exoneration of three men convicted of murder, and the aviary at the Queens Zoo.
